header.p: Xenofarm is currently deployed in three different projects.

ul.li:
Pike
Pike is a general purpose programming language and the longest user of Xenofarm, since Xenofarm was originally written for testing Pike. Result pages for Pikefarm can be found here.

LysKOM Server
LysKOM is a communication system that combins the best aspects of ICQ and news into a system that more or less predates them both. Result pages for LysKOM can be found here.

Python
Python is another general purpose programming language that also uses Xenofarm to find portability problems. There are result pages both for development python and for the stable python.
